sections.MISSION:
1/2CR Master SUAS Trainers conduct a quadcopter (Skydio X2D) familiarization training from 04-05 April 2024 at the Vilseck Army Air Field (VAAF) IOT certify operators from other Squadron’s ISO Saber Strike 24.
Commander’s
sections.PURPOSE: Certifying operators from other Squadrons within the Regiment and additional adjacent units expands the scope of SUAS capabilities, facilitating additional realism in maneuver training and combat readiness.
sections.KEY TASKS:
Conduct academic instruction
Conduct hands-on familiarization with the flight systems
Conduct training flights
4) Conduct dropping flights
sections.END STATE:
2/2CR, 3/2CR, and the 173rd IBCT(A) all have operators who are certified to fly the Skydio X2D quadcopter.
Training Objectives
1. Teach basics of sUAS to students.​
2. Improve knowledge and understanding of the Skydio system.​
3. Instruct students on proper safety practices with the Skydio.​
4. Demonstrate how to properly fly Skydio system.​
5. Students practice flying the Skydio on VAAF.​
Resourcing
